long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FairKiwi - Shop Sustainably, Stress-Free! 🌍

Make every purchase count with FairKiwi, your guide to eco-conscious shopping!

Key Features:
✅ Ratings Where You Shop: See sustainability ratings directly on Amazon (more stores coming soon!).
⏳ Save Time on Research: We compile ratings from trusted, public sources, so you can shop confidently without the hassle.
🌿 Spot Real Sustainability: Avoid greenwashing and find brands that truly live their values - not just their marketing.
💚 Make a Difference: Support your community, ethical manufacturers, and the planet.

Start shopping smarter today with FairKiwi - because small choices lead to big change

👉 How It Works:
FairKiwi integrates seamlessly into your online shopping experience. While browsing Amazon (and soon other stores!), you’ll see sustainability ratings displayed directly on product pages - powered by data from leading public sources for full transparency.

Why Ratings Matter:
Our unique algorithm evaluates brands on key factors like:

🌍 Environmental Impact
🏭 Ethical Manufacturing Practices
🤝 Corporate Social Responsibility

FairKiwi simplifies this data and combines it all into one simple score, making it easy for you to choose brands that align with your values.

What’s Next for FairKiwi:
We’re constantly evolving! Here’s what’s on the horizon:

🚀 Support for more online stores
🔍 Ingredient and material analysis
🎯 Enhanced filters for your sustainable shopping preferences
💪 Join the Movement:

FairKiwi isn’t just an extension - it’s a community of conscious consumers like YOU. Together, we can shift the market toward a more sustainable future!

Install FairKiwi Today: Small choices lead to big change.
